name: 許益瑞
objective:
最近數年應用電腦軟體來計算分子的幾何形狀與力學數據已變得相當熱門，這些軟體不但計算小分子相當快速，即使是很複雜的分子也可行。本課程探討目前所常用軟體的原理、應用範圍、準確性與限制條件並舉數個例子來顯現其特點。學生最好要有量子化學的基礎。本課程將強調學生親自上機使用軟體，作業修課者必須要能有電腦可供執行。
The progress of electronic industry accelerates the computer development so that computer simulation becomes one of the important tool in many fields. In this course, we will discuss how to apply the computer to assist the molecular structure design. In order to gain insight into the basic idea of structural design, the fundamental background in molecular mechanics, molecular dynamics, and quantum chemistry will be introduced. A practical software introduction will also be included in the course.
